articles.content: If Newcastle and Central Coast were watching the Sydney derby on Saturday they might have been thinking a couple of things. Firstly, is Jack Rodwell going to be a problem for us this season? And seco… [+4049 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Black Caps legspinner Ish Sodhi's spectacular caught and bowled v India - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Ish Sodhi made a one-handed grab to dismiss India's captain but couldn't stop another T20 defeat by NZ
articles.content:
There werent a lot of highlights from the Black Caps in their 3-0 T20 series defeat by India.
 But legspinner Ish Sodhi did grab some of the spotlight with his sensational one-handed caught-and-bowl… [+1074 chars]

articles.title: The Wrap: Three epic Test matches all swing to the north - The Roar
